block.field: Paint the block with this colour.
OnFrame is called for each image frame.
Sets pixels that fall in the specified range to white; all others are set to black.
Finds a list of contours and their hierarchies in the image.
Draws the contours into the image.
Load a previously saved frame as the one to process.
Store a frame to load later in onFrame
Creates a convex hull and calculates the solidity of a contour
Selects a single contour from a group
Performs a morphological transformation with the given kernel.
Truncates the colors in an image based on a cutoff value.
Truncates the colors in an image based using an adaptive cutoff.
Removes items that have not been in motion from the image.
Sets pixels that fall in the specified range to white; all others are set to black.
Splits the image into RGB channels, places each in an Image variable.
